inclusion.criterion: no previous diagnosis of rhythm disorder
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: on examination on the ECG, the patient was not in sinus rhythm
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: the patient has a known heart rhythm disorder and / or is being treated for it
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 55yo woman with h/o ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis who presented with watery, non bloody diarrhea and weakness. She has a history of 2 prior C diff infections, the most recent just 1 month ago.
